message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with the purchase, I am willing to sell the product to you for $9500. This special price is available only for the next 24 hours. Kindly let me know if you are interested, so we can finalize the details promptly.
